mutation {
	updateDataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
		input: {
			name: "Updated Name"
			description: "Updated description"
			repo: "someotherrepo"
			pii: true
			keywords: ["keyword1", "keyword2"]
		}
	) {
		id
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		owner { group }
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "updateDataproduct": {
      "name": "Updated Name",
      "description": "Updated description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1",
				"keyword2"
      ],
      "owner": {
        "group": "dataplattform@nav.no"
      },
      "pii": true,
      "repo": "someotherrepo"
    }
  }
}
